select_locations: select * from polling_places order by name asc
insert_reject: insert into wait_times (timestamp, original_time, pollingplace_id, phone_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?)
insert_accept: insert into wait_times (timestamp, original_time, parsed_time, pollingplace_id, phone_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
select_location_id: select id from polling_places where phone =
select_phone_id: select id from hash_numbers where number =
